title: Apple VS Banana
text:
For years people have been wondering: who is better? The Apple or the Banana? We have the answer to that mystery.

Banana's are better at volleyball then the Apples, but the Apples beat the Banana's at soccer. So, who is the best?

We asked Robin Boers (me) from the Netherlands. He was the only one with the answer. So the answer is... the ... only .... and .... real....

Komkommer!


So do you want to see more mysterys solved? Subscribe to my blog!

Cheers, Robin!
